alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 9:03PM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph and produce areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Central Washington, Coastal Hancock and Coastal Washington Counties. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Friday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause localized hazardous travel. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Power outages are possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington
